title: Help Center
subtitle: Get answers to your questions and learn how to make the most of OCTA-GRAM
description: Find answers to your questions and learn how to make the most of OCTA-GRAM
searchPlaceholder: Search for help articles, videos, and more...
gettingStartedDesc: Learn the basics of using OCTA-GRAM for network monitoring.
networkManagementDesc: Learn how to effectively manage network devices and settings.
qualityMonitoringDesc: Learn how to monitor and analyze network quality metrics.
aiAssistantDesc: Learn how to use the AI assistant for network analysis and optimization.
faq1: How do I add a new device for monitoring?
faq1Answer: To add a new device, go to the Network Management section, click on 'Add Device' and follow the on-screen instructions to set up the device details.
faq2: Can I export network analysis reports?
faq2Answer: Yes, you can export reports in various formats including PDF, CSV, and JSON. Navigate to the Reports section and use the export button.
faq3: How often is network data updated?
faq3Answer: By default, data is updated every 30 seconds, but you can adjust this interval in the Settings page under Network Settings.
faq4: Can I use OCTA-GRAM with MikroTik devices?
faq4Answer: Yes, OCTA-GRAM supports integration with MikroTik devices. You will need to configure the device settings in the Network Management section.
faq5: How do I update my license?
faq5Answer: You can update your license by going to the Developer section and clicking on 'Manage License'. Follow the instructions to enter your new license key.

communicationToolsDesc: A collection of tools to help you analyze and optimize your network connections
connectionTestingDesc: Tools to test and analyze your connection quality
advancedToolsDesc: Specialized tools for advanced network diagnostics
communicationToolsFAQ: How do I use the communication tools?
communicationToolsFAQAnswer: OCTA-GRAM provides a variety of communication tools such as ping test, jitter analysis, packet loss test, port scanner, DNS lookup, traceroute, and network configuration analyzer. You can access these tools from the Communication Tools section in the main menu. Each tool has its own specific function to help you diagnose and improve your network connections.

faqSection.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faqSection.question1: How do I add a new device for monitoring?
faqSection.answer1: To add a new device, navigate to the Network Management section, click on 'Add Device', and follow the on-screen instructions to set up your device details.
faqSection.question2: Can I export network analysis reports?
faqSection.answer2: Yes, you can export reports in various formats including PDF, CSV, and JSON. Simply go to the Reports section and use the export button.
faqSection.question3: How often is network data updated?
faqSection.answer3: By default, data is updated every 30 seconds, but you can adjust this interval in the Settings page under Network Configuration.
faqSection.question4: Can I use OCTA-GRAM with MikroTik devices?
faqSection.answer4: Yes, OCTA-GRAM supports integration with MikroTik devices. You will need to configure the device settings in the Network Management section.
faqSection.question5: How do I update my license?
faqSection.answer5: You can update your license by going to the Developer section and clicking on 'Manage License'. Follow the instructions to enter your new license key.
